FieldDefinition.description: Type of output transformation to apply to nodes in hidden layers in order to keep values within a manageable range. Valid values are: Sigmoid, TanH (hyperbolic tangent), ReLU (rectified linear units). Default is Sigmoid. (NEURAL_NET)
FieldDefinition.name: hiddenActivation

FieldDefinition.description: Width of each hidden layer expressed as a percentage of the number of inputs to the neural net. Allowed values are between 0 (exclusive) and 1 (inclusive). (NEURAL_NET)
FieldDefinition.name: hiddenUnitPercentage

FieldDefinition.description: The number of layers. Allowed values: 2 - 4 (NEURAL_NET)
FieldDefinition.name: layerCount

FieldDefinition.description: Type of output transformation to apply to nodes in the output layer in order to keep values within a manageable range. Valid values are: Linear and Sigmoid. If no value is specified, an activation function is automatically selected based on the OpType of the goal variable. (NEURAL_NET)
FieldDefinition.name: layerWithLoss

FieldDefinition.description: Machine learning algorithm (NEURAL_NET, LINEAR_REGRESSION, LOGISTIC_REGRESSION, DECISION_TREE, RANDOM_FOREST, GRADIENT_BOOST, and SVM)
FieldDefinition.name: learningTechnique

FieldDefinition.description: The maximum tree depth. Allowed values: 2+ (DECISION_TREE, RANDOM_FOREST, and GRADIENT_BOOST only)
FieldDefinition.name: maxDepth

FieldDefinition.description: Limit learner to use a specified number of fields (affects runtime)
FieldDefinition.name: maximumAllowedFields

FieldDefinition.description: The number of iterations to use. Allowed values: 1+ (GRADIENT_BOOST)
FieldDefinition.name: numberOfIterations

FieldDefinition.description: Should identical columns be consolidated and columns with only one value be removed? (DECISION_TREE)
FieldDefinition.name: removeDuplicatesAndUniformColumns

FieldDefinition.description: The number of trees. Allowed values: 2+ (RANDOM_FOREST)
FieldDefinition.name: treeCount
